facebook/ThreatExchange.summary: Recent activities in the ThreatExchange repository include a push event and a pull request event, both occurring on December 30, 2024. The push event involved a commit to check for the hasher role in the /lookup endpoint, while the pull request event aimed to resolve issue #1703 with a fix that includes a unit test and a detailed test plan to verify the correction, specifically ensuring a 403 error is returned when hashing is disabled due to a missing role.
